Interface Account

public interface Account
    User account.

    $Id$

    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • balance

        int balance()
        Current account balance in cents.
        Returns:
        Balance in cents

      • transactions

        Iterable<String> transactions()
        All operations on the account. Operations are returned in reverse chronological order, the most recent at the beginning of the list.
        Returns:
        All operations on the account

      • add

        void add(int amount,
       String text)
        Add a new operation.
        Parameters:
        amount - Amount to fund (positive) or charge (negative)
        text - Description of the operation
